org.apache.hivemind.schema.rules
Class AddToMapRule

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hivemind.impl.BaseLocatable
      org.apache.hivemind.schema.rules.BaseRule
          org.apache.hivemind.schema.rules.AddToMapRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hivemind.Locatable, org.apache.hivemind.LocationHolder, Rule
public class AddToMapRule
extends BaseRule

Rule used to connect a child object to its parent that is a map, by invoking a method on the parent, passing the child and a key that is taken from a childs attribute.

Author:
Achim Huegen
